question: 状況
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>condition</kanji> <kanji>condition</kanji> is the <vocabulary>condition</vocabulary>. It's also the <vocabulary>circumstances</vocabulary> if you can remember that. It's like saying "What's the condition!??" which is similar to saying "What's the circumstances?"
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
